# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter at position (x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter at position (x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure.

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position (x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler at position (x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine at position (x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group at position (x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group at position (x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt at position (x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt at position (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities that are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that entities are connected to the electric network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities that are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that entities are plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using transport belts without items to transport
- Ensure that transport belts have items to transport before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined by the agent.
